content.detailedDescription: I was coordinating sightings of aircraft from flightaware to actual sky. i noticed on the computer there was an approach to greater pittsburgh airport. so i went outside to view it. my parents whom i was visiting live exactly on the approach path to runways 28 center and 28 right approximately 12 nm from the airport. when i went outside i heard the approach but ignored it cause i saw this strange thing. i quickly called my mom outside to get another witness. we observed the object to the west of us moving in a straight line from south to north. it almost looked like the hale bopp comet except moving. it was a pinpoint star like object. it had a hazy cone coming from it. the cone was shaped fanned out in the direction of travel. like this. 0< moving to the right. not like a missile with smoke or haze fanning out opposite direction of travel. that's what i thought was really strange. the haze and pinpoint light slightly pulsated and was blue-ish white. it actually from our viewpoint travelled through the ladle of the big dipper and continued north till we lost sight of it behind a building. as it made it's way north it increased in size from our viewpoint. about the size of a pea if you hold it between your fingers at arms length. i felt puzzled about the direction of travel and the way the cone fanned out.
content.summary: Pinpoint starlike object with a hazy cone fanned out in the direction of travel very high up.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were returning from the movie at approximately 10-15 when she had mentioned something in the sky and asked me what planet it was because she knows i would know right away and i said i thought it was venus but then realized we were not pointing in the right direction for that to be true after debating whether or not it was a planet the reddish orange light, which had a massive corona, much too bright for a planet, which is almost the size of a penny from our perspective suddenly dimmed dramatically,at that point i had noticed the light was actually coming from a spherical object you could still see some light but it was very very dim hard to see with the naked eye. now the light was about the size of the "." on my phone the object about 10 times that size now that the corona was gone. as we turned the light slowly left my view, as if it had been pointing our direction and without that small light i lost sight of the object entirely. definitely not a planet. not a human aircraft either. from beginning to end about 4 mins. i should mention the light dimmed the exact second i felt i determined and mentioned it wasn't a planet to my friend.
content.summary: Dark spherical object emitted 1 color light in varying intensity

content.detailedDescription: We were out observing the stars from the roof of the house, and all of a sudden, this object started going across the sky. this object was a dimly lit up ball of fog that was almost like it was cloaked or something. it made absolutely no noise, and was obvious, because there was an airplane that flew over during this that was making a noise. we watched it for about 3 minutes, then an airplane flew over, and made noise.
content.summary: It was a dim lite up mist or fog moving across the sky in a strait line and made no noise. an airplane flew by during sighting.

content.detailedDescription:
We had severe thunderstorms here most of the night. watching the weather forecast on ctv news barrie. at 11:00 pm. 
they have a camera to show outside conditions at the time of forecast...
if there is away for you to review this weather forecast...If you look closely you will see something move across the camera from left to right.
there was a small clearing in the thunderstorm and it cleared up for only a few minutes. 
if you do review this....Can you please let me know what that was.

i do like and watch your show every week.... you do say you would like evidence to each sighting... can't get more reliable than this.
content.summary: On a weather report.

content.detailedDescription: I and my boyfriend were standing out side our apartments in lancaster ohio when suddenly he pointed out an odd apparition moving across the sky,there were no clouds just stars out.It was at a stand still at first had a camofloug like a star , then started to drift. this object was horse shoe shaped/ with a wired misty fog beam guiding it. as it drifted eastern it started to turn into a ball it stopped midway and drifted some more then turned back into the horse shoe shape then disappeared.
content.summary: I was outside with my boyfriend when he pointed out a very unfamiliar foggy but bright apparition in the sky,for five minutes we watched as it hovered then went on then disapeared . this ufo was bumarang shaped with a camo star on the bottom.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi, can't believe what i am feeling right now. i have goose bumps and chills down my spine.
was it the government, ufo, cia?? what did i just see?? i reported it to the manalapan nj police department and the cops think i'm crazy. they said "sorry mame we cannot do anything about it", really! something is flying over my head in our air space and you cannot do anything about it? 
did they not know about it? maybe they do.
well here is what happened.
i was visiting my parents in manalapan nj, it was around 9:50 pm on june 22, 2015. i was leaving and as i was packing my car i thought i saw a bat or bird in the sky from the corner of my eye, i turned and looked closer to see this thing flying towards me as it got closer it got larger in size.
it was massive about 300 feet wide and 400 feet long, extremely dark black, triangular, shape that looked as if it was a shadow because it reflected no light. i could see the shape of this object so clearly, i couldn't believe what my eyes were really seeing. there were no lights anywhere on this flying triangular shaped object.  it was so very dark, scary, and very creepy, like a bat mobile flying over my head. unreal !

my dad was coming out of the house and i kept yelling to him to look above over his head, this thing came up madigan lane from pease rd to (northeast) then hovered over my head for a few seconds then went southeast towards longbow drive. over their house. so strange it had no lights, and moved so quickly and changed directions on a dime. a few hours later, i am trying to make sense of it all. i don't know who to tell and who needs to know but someone needs to hear of what i just saw. i don't take things like this lightly as i am so freaked out at the moment. 
i hope some answers start to surface soon and i hope i wasn't the only one that saw it this evening.
 it's a scary thought that no one is aware of what is thing traveling in our airspace at night at 9:50pm, in manalapan, nj??

here is a sketch of what i saw in the sky, i drew it as soon as i got home.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Black, massive, triangular shape, reflected no light, completely black, looked like it was 2 floors, so large!

content.detailedDescription: At 11:47pm i noticed a misty glowing light, as if a headlight was seen through fog. it was coming from the west moving north east, then abruptly changed direction heading almost due north. the event last between a 2 min and 2 min 30 sec. it never crossed the horizon line, it appeared to go up, rather than continuing due north past the horizon line. i brought it to the attention of my fiancé and she also pointed out there were no flashing lights on it just a steady misty glow. we also noticed there were stars out which could be seen clearly as well as airplanes which had the noticeable flashing lights on them. they were clearly visible in the sky with no abstraction.
content.summary: Glowing blurred light, moving steadily on clear non cloudy night changed direction without banking

content.detailedDescription:
For a month or so now, we have witnessed the "kansas city lights" as these objects are called.  they have been seen by all who work here, at night.  
1.) i was outside, smoking and enjoying a peaceful night.  (last night) was looking to see the alignment of regulus, jupiter, and venus. 
3.). i casually noted a jet heading west, at high altitude, contrail streaming behind it.  abruptly i saw a red-orange sphere/globe slightly above the contrails and pacing the aircraft perfectly, about 3 seconds behind it.  
4.) a person who has studied all aircraft for about 30 years and, a former surveillance/recon specialist of the us army, i knew immediately that it wasn't anything man made, nor reflecting of the sun which was not positioned to do so.  given what i have recently observed in the western sky. my first inclination was ufo.
5.). as usual now,y feelings were more of a internal monologue of "no one but me saw that". these sightings make me feel alone typically as i'm the only one looking.  i llive with my wife who is the live-in supervisor of a group home.  my feelings verge on depressive, because i can not get video or pictoral evidence of what i see due to distance.  local media seems to be ignoring me even as i call in on objects that i'm observing, unmoved for almost a hour.
6.) at least 7-8.
content.summary: "kc lights" for a month and 4 short duration, silent orange orbs at various times.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from work, i turned off of wickham road on to eau gallie blvd heading west toward u.S. 95. i came around a curve in the road, and noticed several cars pulled over in the grass median. i slowed way down thinking they had been involved in a wreck, but then noticed they were all looking up, toward the west. when i looked up, i saw a triangle shaped object, with rounded corners, it was right in front of us, at a height just above the tree line. i pulled off to the side of the road to get a better look. it was moving slowly, in a straight line, toward the south east. it had a circle on the bottom of the craft, toward the rear, with flames shooting out of it, but it was silent. i first thought it was a hot air balloon, since it was moving so slowly, and not making any sound. but it didn't have the basket underneath like a hot air balloon would have, and then it hit me, the flames were shooting down, like an exhaust, not up, like to heat the air in a balloon. the object was about the size and thickness of a school bus, laying on its side. i did not notice any lights, just the bright orange flames shooting down out of the circle. i couldn't see any doors or windows. besides the exhaust opening, it looked like a solid object. it was white. i had just gotten an "i-phone" a day or 2 before, it was my first smart phone, and i didn't know how to use the camera, and didn't want to take my eyes off of it to fumble around with the phone for fear it would be gone before i figured out how to take a picture. i have been kicking myself for the last few years now because i could have gotten some pictures or video if i had taken the time to learn how to use the camera function before the incident. the craft kept moving in a straight line, toward the south east, and i lost site of it as it went over the trees toward sarno road. i thought about following it to see where it was going, but was still trying to process what i was seeing, and if i was in any danger. the direction it was going seemed like it was heading toward melbourne airport, and i was sure they would pick it up on radar or at least someone would report seeing it, but i didn't see anything on the news. i told my wife and kids about it when i got home, and they reacted like i was joking, sure, you saw a ufo...So i haven't talked about it much since it happened. i would just like to know if anyone else did report a similar sighting around that time frame so i'll know it really happened.
content.summary: I saw a triangle shaped craft, with rounded corners. it was about the size of a school bus, laying on its side. it had a large round area on the bottom, toward the rear, like an exhaust, with flames shooting out.

content.detailedDescription:
Outside in north carolina in a hot tub with 5 relatives.  the lights attracted me to it.  directly above us i saw the lights slowly changing from green to yellow (i forget what other colors) coming from the bottom of the craft.  i don't remember the pattern, but it seemed to be in a certain order of slowly flashed colors. they were round like spotlights, but not that bright.  i also can't remember if there were 4 or 3 lights changing.  if i could remember the number of lights then i could remember the shape of the craft. it was difficult to see the shape in the dark.  i thought it was cool & interesting & wondered what it was doing up there.  
i know 2 or 3 others saw it because we were all quiet-looking at it for about a minute.  then there was nothing but darkness & everyone went back to partying.  
it was weird that no one spoke about it, so i didn't bring it up until years later.  two people remember it, but didn't say anything more.  i'm guessing they think it was something from the air base near the outer banks where we were.
content.summary: Saw hovering craft slowly flashing separate colored round green, yellow, (other colors)lights

content.detailedDescription: Went out side at t minus 10 sec. to whach left off of a space launch, ( people said i could see cape kenndys launch rocket from stuart fla. where i was liveing at time. what caught my eye was the formatin of lights coming due south at me, which got bigger the closer it got to me then it was right above me .  the craft apperd to be black with lights under the craft, very large.  when it got over head it took off so fast due south just gone in a split second. there was no launch, went back in and they had stoped the count down  but later the launch did happen and i could see it from where i was. i often wondered if the craft was the reason they delayed launch  my date is apx. due to the years that has pasted. i knew that i had seen a ufo.
content.summary: Triangle black flying " v" with lights underside of craft

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the bunk of the truck i was driving. i was in a truck stop on hwy 33? in columbia city indiana. just after 5am est.It was a very clear morning and i was watching all the aircraft coming and going from the chicago area.There were a couple of local aircraft in the columbia city area. i also saw one or two satellites on their paths. yes.. the sky was that clear that morning. not a cloud to be seen.

suddenly i saw a dot of light traveling in a west to east direction. i was about two hours outside of chicago and by my reckoning when the dot of light was over the city of chicago it took a 90 degree turn to the north without slowing down. in the blink of an eye it was out of sight going north. this dot of light appeared to be at a much higher altitude than any commercial aircraft. an airplane at cruising altitude will be about 30 to 35 thousand feet. this light appeared to be much higher than that...So what...80 or maybe 100,000 feet. it's speed appeared to be roughly twice the speed of the commercial aircraft in the area. at cruising speed an airliner will be flying at about 600 miles an hour give or take. double that to 1200 mph...Wow that's quick.

i remember thinking to myself that there is nothing man made that can travel that high and that fast. with the exception of spacecraft. and yet here it was making a 90 degree turn at what appeared to be full speed.

my last thought as i got ready to go back to work was what the heck was that?
content.summary: Small star like light travelling at an extreme rate of speed/change of direction

content.detailedDescription:
My roommate screamed for me to come out and look, i came of the house first and observed a symmetrical disc or maybe birthday cake shaped object. this object was gleaming metallic and was moving steadily.. i observed for 10~ seconds or so before i determined it was unusual and ran back in the house to call for my other roommates to take a look.. it traveled in a north eastern direction and i lost it behind some tree's. before i lost visual i watched it wobble a bit then bank at about a 35 degree angle towards the earth where it dropped altitude slightly and i lost it behind some nearby tree's. 

my feeling was it was some kind of drone or unusual aircraft, but it made no noise.. the camera did not pick it up that well but i could see it pretty good and it did not look like anything i had ever seen before.
content.summary: Silver disc like object entered view from the south, heading ne altitude lower then normal aircraft usually observed in area

content.detailedDescription: Here is how it started. i was in my backyard enjoying a cool crisp evening sitting in a lawn chair and smoking a cigarette. it was a perfectly clear night and around 50 degrees f. i sat back in the chair and stretched arms out and my head back looking straight up. i spotted a bright star like object moving from north to south and at first i thought it was a satellite. it appeared to be in space then it stops on a dime and then it blinks out to totally dark. i kept looking at that spot and about 10 seconds later it reappeared then it resumed it's path. satellites don't stop. i went in the house and grabbed my 25 y/o stepson to come outside in the backyard to help me look for more of the same or better. i asked him to look at the western and northern sky and i would watch the southern and eastern sky. he said okay but if we don't see anything in ten minutes i'm out of here. i said okay that's fair so we started scanning the sky. five seconds later i hear him shout "look man,look". for a couple seconds i thought he was just messing with me but there seemed to be an urgency in his voice. i look over and he is pointing back toward the west. i had to look down his arm to spot them but there they were 3 of them flying single file one closely behind the other. i told him i see them. as they got closer about 5 seconds later they went from single file to a triangular fighter formation so fast if you would have blinked you would have missed it. now they are almost directly overhead and i would estimate their altitude as 500 to 1000 ft. and their airspeed at 400 mph. we could see the underside of each craft. there was an oval hole in the middle of each oval saucer or disc and outward from that there were slots very similar to looking at a hunter ceiling fan motor housing with the slots to let the heat out. they then made a graceful elbow type turn while flying just inches apart. it was as if one mind was controlling all three disc. as they continued north we were losing sight of the belly of the craft. they each had an erie orange type glow about them. i would surmise about 24 hours later the glow was a reflection off of their craft from the amber colored sodium street lights on danieldale blvd. as they got further away they just looked like 3 bright stars then the most incredible thing happened. the craft in the back left position broke formation with a path that looked like a c then stopped at the top of the c and immediately re traced it's path back down the c and back into fighter formation. it gained about 3000 ft. in altitude and came back in about 4 seconds while also traveling forward at about 400 mph. it was the most awesome acrobatic maneuver i have ever seen. i don't think there is any way a human being could have withstood that kind of a g force. we now lose sight of them and look at each other and i said to my stepson "do you know what we just saw"? he said yeah we just saw 3 extraterrestrial space ships. a couple of seconds later we both hit the deck because an fa-18 hornet flys right over the top of us heading east. the engine noise from those 2 engines shook the ground. then we see another jet coming from the southwest then a third hornet from the west. they join up and start flying south. my stepson and i both said in stereo "hey you are going the wrong way then suddenly they all 3 turn north and light their afterburners. the fire coming out of those engines were longer than the jets themselves. they motor scootered out of there very fast and we lost sight but about 10 seconds later there was a huge explosion that bowed my window glass inward about an inch and it flexed back without breaking. you could also feel this explosion on your feet. i knew right away they had gone supersonic and broke the sound barrier trying to catch these saucers. they hardly ever do that over populated areas. we decided to go back in and watch the 10 pm news to see if anyone else may have reported seeing the same thing we saw. we were watching channel 4 (fox)news and at about 10:22 or so the anchor clarice tinsley says they have had hundreds of calls about a large explosion in southwest dallas county. she said a live truck is on scene and jeff crilley will give us a report after we come back from commercial break. they come back and jeff is standing in front of a wrought iron gate that said something munitions plant. he says we think there has been an underground explosion here at the plant but we can't get anyone to comment on this developing story. then clarice tinsley says well that's it for this broadcast and if it warrants we will interrupt regular programming to give an up date. nothing more was reported on that night and there was absolutely nothing about this in the newspaper the next morning. hensley field (grand prairie naval base) was still operational at that time and we think that is where the fa-18 hornets came from. it's been a little more than twenty years since this happened and it still blows me away. for weeks after this happened it was like a movie reel playing over and over again. it was hard to focus on anythng and finally i said hey you have to let this go or you will go mad. so i deal with it an go about my life knowing without a doubt they is extraterrestrial life out there and if i had to guess how much farther ahead of our technology they are i would say hundreds of thousands of years if not more.
content.summary: Three oval shaped disc each the size of a passenger jet, noiseless, up close,detail,in classic fighter formation.

content.detailedDescription:
My ufo/uso sighting is one that took place about thirty one or so years ago. i must have been at least 18 or 19 at the time. date and time is approximate. but i do know it must have been after i turned eighteen as the clubs back then and the legal age for alcohol consumption was eighteen. the event itself is as clear as day. but as the years have passed i have kept this incident for the most part to myself.


in the late evening hour at or around 9:30-10:30 p.M. (time is approximate)in 1984 or 85 while a friend drove both he and i from central maui to west maui to go to what was then the hottest night club at one of the resorts. as usual we were both excited to get there as most teenagers are.  but on this particular night i noticed on the mountainside above the highway near and past the maalaea  boat harbor along the coast a singular green light hovering. my first thought was that it couldn't have been a helicopter because it was a green ball of light and to be hovering above the ground without a spotlight would be dangerous as there are power lines in certain areas. the highway itself has numerous turns and the visibility towards the mountainside is intermittent. but as the passenger i focused my attention on the green light. it hovered for what seemed like minutes until i lost sight of it.  but as we drove on, i noticed upon one of the turns while looking in the opposite direction at the coast that there was a series of green lights or orbs in a straight line much like what one would see on an airport landing strip at night in the water heading in the direction of the island of kahoolawe. i am not certain of the amount but there appeared to be at least 6 to 8 and as the one furthest out glowed bright, the one nearest the shore seem to fade as it moved. as we kept driving now out of sight and view of the lights in the water i remained with my entire body turned to the back of the car looking through the rear window to try and see anything but at that point we had gone past the point of seeing that far back.

my friend was asking me what i was looking at then i asked if he had seen  the lights both on the mountainside and in the water, he said he didn't. he thought i imagined the whole thing or made it up and didn't take it seriously. we went on to our destination.  years later after he moved to the mainland and married and then returned home for a visit i asked him again if he remembers seeing those lights, he said he didn't. he asked if i was serious after all these years. i know i wasn't imagining it as that memory comes back to me every so often in a dream or even when driving along that very coastline.

i had once seen an televised episode of uso's a year ago or so and it was just like reliving what i had seen so many years ago down to the green lights used in the episode. yet i still remained silent.  but it was only until a hangar 1 episode that talked about the reasons why so many sightings go unreported that i finally realized that there was no shame to reveal and share my experience to get answers in hopes that perhaps others may have witnessed the same thing. i know i'm not crazy and to the very core of my being i know i saw something that night whether it can or can't be explained.
content.summary: Ufo/uso sighting in maui, hawaii

content.detailedDescription: When i checked something on my security system i noticed a brigth white orb flying behind a tree. the object is a steady white light emitting orb only seen in the corner.
content.summary: Glowing white orb found on security cam footage

content.detailedDescription: I was driving with my dad to go pick up my sister and we were on a road that's not extremely busy. we came around a corner and slowly moving right above the trees and across the road we were on was a huge triangle-like craft. it was dark out but we could see that the corners or the triangle were rounded and we were then almost right underneath it. we were able to see that underneath it were bigger sized lights that were flashing quickly in the sequence of 2,1,2,1... we rolled down the windows and there wasn't a single sound. it was going maybe 2-3 miles an hour. my dad tried to get out of the car and i screamed and grabbed him because i was young and terrified that he was going to get abducted. we watched as it glided almost over us and continued over the gully, we tried to follow it but were unable to do so as there were no roads in the direction the craft was going. we were pretty sure that it was an alien craft but thought it could have possibly been some sort of government aircraft the army base about 15 miles away had been testing out. we were in complete awe, i was terrified at first but then just curious. this happened about 20 years ago and it's still one of the clearest memories i have in my life.
content.summary: Triangle moving slowly above trees, no sound, lights continually flashed from 2 to 1 quickly, almost directly above us

content.detailedDescription: Out side at 11:08pm est admiring the night sky with the stars, thinking wow, it's a very very clear for a windsor night sky.  caught something moving directly overhead from east to west.  as i focused in on the object, my initial thought was, that's not a plane...I know planes.  i was dark in appearance and had 4 orangish lights visible on the bottom forming a square like formation on a circular object.  no clouds at all.  you could see the object as it transitioned the night sky, no sound, nothing! it almost appeared to slow down and change direction instantly like pin-ball bouncing off a solid object, then accelerating instantaneously in a northerly direction, slowing down again and changing direction again in the same manner continuing west when i lost site of it behind my 90 foot maple tree.  there were 2 commercial flights heading east over detroit at approx 15,000 feet.  it was truly the most incredible event i've ever witnessed. it took no longer then 10 seconds when this this event occurred last night.  truly amazing!  i still have goose-bumps! wow! i wasn't prepared for this occurrence, so i've got zero evidence. sorry! i wonder if others witnessed this occurrence given how clear it was last night.
content.summary: Incredible maneuvers

content.detailedDescription: Out side at 11:08pm est admiring the night sky with the stars, thinking wow, it's a very very clear for a windsor night sky.  caught something moving directly overhead from east to west.  as i focused in on the object, my initial thought was, that's not a plane...I know planes.  i was dark in appearance and had 4 orangish lights visible on the bottom forming a square like formation on a circular object.  no clouds at all.  you could see the object as it transitioned the night sky, no sound, nothing! it almost appeared to slow down and change direction instantly like pin-ball bouncing off a solid object, then accelerating instantaneously in a northerly direction, slowing down again and changing direction again in the same manner continuing west when i lost site of it behind my 90 foot maple tree.  there were 2 commercial flights heading east over detroit at approx 15,000 feet.  it was truly the most incredible event i've ever witnessed. it took no longer then 10 seconds when this this event occurred last night.  truly amazing!  i still have goose-bumps! wow! i wasn't prepared for this occurrence, so i've got zero evidence. sorry! i wonder if others witnessed this occurrence given how clear it was last night.
content.summary: Incredible maneuvers

content.detailedDescription:
Was traveling alone to work early on june 4, 2015 at approx 0420hrs when i noticed the radio was overpowered by static. i changed channels via preset and all 10 channels were static. i thought this was odd. i happened to notice off to my left a single bright, pulsating blue/white light and thought it was the cell phone tower in the area, but i was wrong. i could see this light near the cell phone tower, along with both strobe lights on the tower that i see everyday. i set my cruise at 75 so i could keep an eye on this object. the closer i got to the tower on i95, the bigger the light got. i got approx a mile away and was going to snap a picture on my cell phone but i could not get a good focus as i was moving and it was just before daylight. i tried calling my friend who was a few miles behind me to see if he was seeing this object as well and that's when i noticed there was zero service..... zero service when i was less than a mile away from the tower. that's when the object instantly shot w/sw direction, paused for 3-4 seconds, than took off in a sw direction at a speed i have never witnessed before. shortly after, once i approached the town of old town i noticed i had cell service again (approx 4 miles south). i dialed my friend and asked if he saw the object, he confirmed but wishes to remain anonymous.
guesstamation of approx elevation of object was 150-200 above terrain, since the cell tower i'd approx 100ft tall. object was near cell tower, hard to tell how far away from it and also objects diameter since this was near dark before sunrise.
content.summary: Strange lights in sky in early morning before sunrise en commute

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: If i were to put the whole story of how ufo's have become a part of my life, i would be writing basically a book lol..In short last summer, i fell sleep on the living room couch, was awoken to a tiny blue light floating around my eyes, dunno why, but i felt compelled & immediately threw on the blanket around my shoulders, & went to go look up outside at the sky. i proceded to do so for the next 2 nights, what follows is 100% the truth & i still can't comprehend what has been happening to me since then. i witnessed tiny white orbs of light dancing around the night sky, & i then saw huge orbs of orange lights, totally silence, hover still in the night sky. then after about 5 mins of this, the objects began to what i originally thought was the lights dimmng out like a carosine lantern, it wasn't til the 3rd orange orb did this, that i realized these things weren't dimming out, but shooting up skyward, totally silent, at an inconceivable rate of speed. few things to note at this time, when i say orbs of light, i mean these things weren't using lights off the craft, but it was more like whatever these objects were, they were omitting a bright burning look like a torch, or that orange that appears in metal after its heated at a certain tempature.Also note , when i tried using my smart phone camera, the phone went black, fully charged battery at the time, phone just had a black screen, & wouldnt work or do anything, never happened before, only happens when these objects are around. when these objects returned a few nights later, these objects when banking on a turn, looked like an orange donut on fire. the objects were huuuge! no noise, whatsoever. infact in my footage besides my gravy breathing, & the crickets in the background, not a sound!! i leave about 14 miles out from o'hare airport, i know what planes look like & sound like, same with helicopters, & rc drones that are becoming more popular.Wasn't anything like that, in fact i went back a few weeks later & filmed everything in the sky for comparison. i have kept this information, along with my footage to myself, with the exception of a few family members & friends. i thought i was going crazy, with what i was seeing, & it never happened when anyone else was around, or i would see it, go run in the house to get my family, & it would be gone. almost felt like it was toying with me, no jk. funny thing is everybody i was trying to talk about my experiences of that first night, along with my sightings in the night sky, & i was told its planes, chinese lanterns, etc. it wasn't til the fleet/parade i call it, when one after another came over the night sky, & the orange orbs, would come over the north eastern horizon, & began to proceed across the night sky, reach a point, the orb would stop, wait for the following one directly behind it, they would stop, in mid air mind you, wait for next, & form perfect triangles spaced out evenly from each other, & then they would fly off in 3s, always 3s, in perfect triangles, or 3 in a row stacked on top of each other, & then fly off over the horizon.Simply breathtaking, my dad joked & said it was like my own small version of close encounters of the 4th kind, i asked him, what that was, because i never heard of it! lol, now i do!  i also would like to interject at this time, this was all last summer, & it is beginning to happen again, only im not exaggerating when i say, almost every other time, i go look up & the night sky, i am seeing these objects..Since my "awakening" as i call it, last summer, i always look up, & i was a believer in life on other planets, & throughout the universe, & i absolutely love astrology, but that was as far as it went. but now, i feel as crazy as this sounds, a pulling, a yearning for more..In short, as of yesterday, & what i witnessed at 4:30am this morning, i feel compelled for more answers, & i would appreciate it if i could talk to someone & perhaps have someone local come see this for themselves, i assure you, its worth your time
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Objects appear at the height of the stars, & playfully fly in random patterns, until they are in our atmosphere

content.detailedDescription:
1. my son and i pulled over into a development to look at some houses. we shot a brief video so i could show my wife a couple of the nicer homes.

2. after viewing the video several times, i noticed a very quick blip halfway through. 

3. upon viewing with the slider on slo motion, i thought it could be nothing other than a ufo. 

4. after reviewing the footage and examining a couple screen captures i perceived the object as either diamond or triangular in shape. it possibly had a relatively small dome on top. the object had a straight line path and based on my estimates (iphone 30 fps default video recording and relative distance / distance covered) was traveling 800-1200 mph?

5. we really weren't aware of the object while the object passed us. 

6. in the video, it accelerated and flew out of view of video.
content.summary: Object caught on video inadvertently

content.detailedDescription: We started playing porch tag like we do every summer. the third round had just started when we my cousin and i ran down to hide by our old barn. we were just passing the corner when we saw this light and we saw it land behind out barn and we saw this tall like grey creature  with a large head standing next to our old car. when my cousin took a step closer and the creature jumped onto our barn roof and screeched and my cousin fell to the ground shaking the being was looking right at me and then this beam came from the ufo after it started hovering over the barn and the alien left my cousin woke up. i asked him if he was ok and he said yeah i am fine but we have to hide fast. as we were hiding i asked him if he remembered anything and he said all he remembers is coming to hide. so at that point i was scared i didn't know if the shaking had effected him or anything so i kept it to my self the next morning i went out before my cousin woke up and looked by the old car and the barn next to the car where the alien was there was an imprint and it was discolored the roof of the barn was dented. after that i never went down there alone and my cousin still says i'm crazy when i talk about it because he doesn't remember anything and i'm making it all up to scare him because i am his older cousin but i know it was real and i know what saw and i know it was real. i was 12 and my cousin was 8
content.summary: The ufo hovered then landed and we saw this being standing next to our old car and it jumped up on the roof of our barn and screeched and my cousin fell down and was shaking after that the alien left and my cousin woke up and he doesnt remember anything

content.detailedDescription: I am 14 and my brother is 12. it had just snowed and we went outside because it was a full moon and about 20 minutes into it we started seeing triangular crafts fly over. they had two red lights on the back corners and one white light in the front corner. it was like they didn't notice us and then they did. the objects were about 500 feet in the air and when they noticed us they came down to about 60 feet above us. my dog lowered his head like something was bothering him. the objects made no sound at all. they stayed about 50 yards away and circled us, there was about 3 of them. this went on for about 10 minutes then a white orb lit up about 20 feet over us and zipped off about 20 feet and disappeared. after that my brother got freaked out went back to the house and that's when he saw a black ape like creature looking at us. he started yelling at me and that's when it took off into the front yard and disappeared into the darkness.After this we went back inside and said we wouldn't tell anyone. i was watching hangar 1 and decided to report it.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangular crafts flew over for 10 minutes then an orb which looked like it was spying on us lit up white and flew over our heads my brother was going back to the house and saw an et which looked like it had been spying on us then it ran off into the dark

content.detailedDescription: In the late fall of the year of 1952 in the county of boone w.Va. while sitting on a glidder swing on the front porch, with my grand mother a bright lite came around the mountain and stopped over the two lane highway below our house. next to my grade school we lived half way up the mountain so we were above the craft. it had a very domed lite under it, that actually was a magnify lite.When i looked to the left of the craft ,i could see a rock formation that we played in. about one mile from the house. i could see the holes that we crawled out of.The craft had port holes on the top of it. they were maned by the grey beings, who pointed at me and my grand mother, and summed a taller one to the window. he shrugged it off as not to worry about us. i looked to the right of the craft, at a tree, and saw a slight movement in it. there was a squirrel that lived in a knot hole facing the craft.It took off through the branches. then the craft took off to the north into space.The next day the local news paper, reported there was ball lighting ,spotted the night before.I knew no one would believe me so i have kept it to my self ever since
content.summary: Why ufos have lights

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting outside with 2 friends, i looked up and saw some strange moving lights. i asked my friends to tell me what they thought. this is my second sighting off of this porch. 
 it seemed to be lights in the shape of a pyrimid, although the body of the object might have been cloaked and i could see the night sky between the lights.
we watched the pyrimid travel back and forth across the sky for about twenty minutes sometimes it would disappear behind the tree line and bounce back up. a few times it seemed to dance. 
 # times i have observed the night sky from that porch and twice i have seen something interesting. i will be watching again tonight!

ps while i was watching the word "tetrahedron" came into my head. i do not think i have heard or known what the word meant, but when i looked it up, it was the shape we saw. (that was why i put "communicated")
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 12:30 at night with 2 other witnesses, a pyrimid tetrahedron.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a morning prayer walk when i noticed the sky open up faster than normal. i took it as an answer to prayer and snapped two pictures. about 5 hours later i pulled them up to show my wife and we noticed a green spot in one of the pics and expanded both pictures and saw the ufo in two positions with different lighting on both pictures. i only noticed the rapid opening up in the sky with the sun shining through the clouds. it was a dark cloudy morning so the sun shine peaked through brighter then usual. i didn't notice the ufo until later that afternoon when i pulled the pics up on my phone.
content.summary: Snapped to pictures of the sky when i notice it open up rapidly.

content.detailedDescription:
About one month ago, i filed a mufon report. i can’t remember the report number. i think the number is 65558 or 65557. when i filed the report i attached some videos. later, a mufon investigator telephoned me. i then told the investigator that i decided not be interviewed. i did that because of privacy concerns. i am also chronically ill, and i am in pain (especially my head) 24/7. 


i am now requesting that my case be reopened. i wish to do that  because i want to have my case on file. 

when i was about five years old, i was viciously attacked by the beings who are behind the videos. i want to state here, the attacks have been going on ever since i was a small child to the present.  

i am attaching some videos to this report: i again want to state that the beings behind the paranormal anomalies on the videos are very intelligent and only let me obtain videos that they wanted to have.
content.summary: Parnormal orbs captured on infrared camera

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a bright light that was similar to what jupiter or venus looks like in the clear night sky. it was moving north-west and looked like it gained altitude. it white light with no strobing lights or red lights. it did not appear to be a plane. it appeared to gain altitude and as it left atmosphere its appearance was like that of a satellite observed with the naked eye. very faint and difficult to see. i observed the faint light as it continued to move in the trajectory. until i could not see it anymore.

i feel like it was strange behavior, never saw anything like this. i have previously seen objects that were like asteroids pass in and out of the atmosphere, but this was different as it was at too low an elevation in origination.

my first thoughts were that this was actually a satellite launch, although i cannot find any documentation saying a launch took place.

also present in the sky were 2 aircraft, one was on a similar path but stayed at its altitude and was minutes behind the objects original altitude from observational origin. another was towards the west.

after i could no longer see the ufo a meteorite came from the east to west and was moving much faster than the ufo in comparison. the ufo had a speed similar to an airplane although it was heading out of the atmosphere and could have been faster than observation point would allow discernment.

i decided to post this for reference to anyone who may be able to do something with this data. at no point did either airplane seem to be near the ufo although my first impression was that the airplane on a similar path was following the object as it left.
content.summary: Bright light moving left atmosphere and light diminished similar to satellite

content.detailedDescription:
I had just got my lawnmower out of the shed to do some mowing, it was a warm and cloudless day. i looked up towards the south west to admire the blue sky when i noticed an airliner flying in a westerly direction at what i would estimate as between twenty and thirty thousand feet. a small metallic sphere appeared at the tail of the aircraft, hovered for a few seconds and then slowly made it's way along the length of the fuselage, after it moved past the nose of the aircraft it disappeared.
the sighting lasted no more than 15-20  seconds. i have been unable to come up with a rational explanation as to what i saw.
content.summary: Metallic sphere buzzing an airliner
